attributes.review: i think this app gave me covid-19...i opened it and immediately started feeling shortness of breath, my throat felt like it was closing up, dizziness and coughing. well now that i think about it maybe i’m just allergic to racists! either way, stay away from this app!!
attributes.title: STAY AWAY!!!

attributes.review: First off just no I open the app to see a naked picture of trump and I’m only 2 years old the it doesn’t let me touch anything and it downloads a virus to my phone I had to get it fixed do not download this app
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: This app is a scam!! I downloaded this app to receive updates on our amazing, sexy, not racist, hot body🥰, no content just rail me president and as soon as I open the app all I see if pictures of Kevin heart!! I scrolled for about 5 minutes and allll I saw was Kevin heart. REMOVE APP
attributes.title: have🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧

attributes.review: i’m just gonna tell you right not to save some time DO NOT GET THIS APP it’s so stupid i opened it and see a big fat chettoo and it scared me so bad i’ve been having nightmares for the past week about it. so if you do want to have nightmares i’d advise you not to get it!!
attributes.title: the worst app ever🤮

attributes.review: This app glitches and crashes every time I try to open it! Such a waste of my time. I highly recommend downloading something else that is actually entertaining and less horrible.
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: Do you think he’s orange because his pants are on fire from all the lies he tells 1 Star, do not recommend. When you click on “who to follow” it’s only white people. The app solicits donations but I thought he was funding his own campaign? 🤔 Weird. Another lie. Lies everywhere.
attributes.title: Liar Liar Pants on Fire

attributes.review: I would NOT recommend this app to anyone who likes their apps to actually function. This is a horrible app and I would give it zero stars if I could. I would give it NEGATIVE stars. Very disappointed.
attributes.title: Problematic and full of user errors

attributes.review: As I gazed upon the app I had the sudden realization that trumps complexion is very akin to leather, somewhat like a basketball. Upon taking notice of this I told my friend and I was immediately electrocuted on the spot for daring to say anything negative about trump. 0/10 on quality, 10/10 on stinkiness
attributes.title: Very stinky

attributes.review: Personally, I feel that the app does not put efforts to reach out to the gen-z audience and leans more towards an older audience, such as boomers. For this reason, I am disappointed to say that this app does not meet up to my expectations. And also, Cheeto boy big angry 🟠😡😤. TikTok Lives Matter ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿.
attributes.title: Out of Reach

attributes.review: I opened this app and expected to see “news” seeing how it’s number 1!! HOWEVER when I opened it I see a Cheeto that called my dog fat and stole my fridge. smh can’t believe trump would do something like this. I am never downloading this app again and have to go wash my lawn.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
